author: mikkimag9645
content: Looking for a Web UI automation / SDET contractor to write auto tests for a protocol on Ethereum blockchain. The task is to define and execute test scripts and evaluate results against predicted outcomes. Fast learner and ability to work independently. Renumeration starts at $50/hour depending on your skillset and availability. 3-5 years Automated Software QA Testing experience is a must. DM me at @queentudor.

author: adorable_axolotl_54784
content: I know there isnt absolute clarity around this but what is the current consensus on when to expect the merge to occur?

author: _shemnon
content: The only consensus is "when it's ready". Many forecast (and are working to hit)  Q4 2021 or Q1 2022, but those are guesses.

author: adorable_axolotl_54784
content: More than likely after December difficulty bomb though no?

author: _shemnon
content: More likely than not that difficulty bomb will be a pre-merge fork, but no consensus yet on how it will play out.

author: _shemnon
content: I wouldn't make any plans on that

author: adorable_axolotl_54784
content: Thanks Danno, you think more likely than not it occurs before Q1 rather than slipping into later in ‘22 though?

author: _shemnon
content: I have no opinion on that.
